ticket.title: script/generate throws 'undefined method id for class ActiveRecord::Base'
ticket.original-body:
When executing script/generate with:
ruby 1.9.1p243 (2009-07-16 revision 24175) [i686-linux] Rails 2.3.3
the following is thrown:
path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/attribute_methods/read.rb:15:in `undef_method': undefined method `id' for class `ActiveRecord::Base' (NameError) from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/attribute_methods/read.rb:15:in `block in <module:Read>' from path/test/vendor/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/concern.rb:11:in `class_eval' from path/test/vendor/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/concern.rb:11:in `append_features' from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:3116:in `include' from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:3116:in `block in <module:ActiveRecord>' from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:3110:in `class_eval' from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:3110:in `<module:ActiveRecord>' from path/test/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:16:in `<top (required)>' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:257:in `block in <module:Rails>' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:87:in `initialize' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:87:in `new' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:87:in `run_initializer' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:97:in `block in run' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:97:in `each' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:97:in `run' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/initializer.rb:110:in `run' from path/test/config/environment.rb:9:in `<top (required)>' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/commands/generate.rb:2:in `require' from path/test/vendor/rails/railties/lib/commands/generate.rb:2:in `<top (required)>' from script/generate:3:in `require' from script/generate:3:in `<main>'
